definitions.definition: A tough band of flexible but inelastic fibrous collagen tissue that connects a muscle with its bony attachment and transmits the force which the muscle exerts.
A wire or bar used to strengthen prestressed concrete .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) A tough band of flexible but inelastic fibrous collagen tissue that connects a muscle with its bony attachment and transmits the force which the muscle exerts.
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) The hamstring of a quadruped .
( construction ) A wire or bar used to strengthen prestressed concrete .
